formulaic dressing

Skirt: Tibi (also here). Sweater: Jcrew. Shoes: Giuseppe Zanotti (also love these). Purse: Valentino. Sunglasses: Karen Walker 'Number One'. Jewelry: Hermes, Cartier, Pomellato.
